document.full_text: a man was arrested as he sought to enter italian prime minister silvio berlusconi's hospital room, three days after the premier being wounded to the face in an attack.
document.title: man arrested trying to enter berlusconi's hospital room
lines_and_colors: a man was arrested as he sought to enter italian prime minister silvio berlusconi's hospital room, three days after the premier being wounded to the face in an attack.
